name: Ghost Recon Wildlands Ghost War Open Beta
name_original: Ghost Recon Wildlands Ghost War Open Beta
description:
Join the beta now!

We are glad to have you try our Ghost War Mode in this time-limited public test. Play Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands PvP in a thrilling 4v4 team deathmatch mode that will put your tactical skills to the test.
Fight on five large maps throughout the Wildlands and adapt to terrain and changing weather conditions. Choose between six classes, each of them having a different playstyle and loadout, and assemble a team ready to handle any situation.
